WorkItem.Description:
first, I acknolwage this is not a End-game Raiding item. :) however, it does help when setting up a fresh 80 or a near 80.
using 2.3.15 after updateing items both from armoy and Wowhead.
From what I can tell, the 84 crit rating is in the items specs, but the ~1700 per min proc (28 dps) is not.
I have tried to hand edit the item to add this proc, but likey due to a misunderstanding on my part I am unable.
 
This does seem to be class/spec specific because in DPSWarr I can edit the item to get the 1700/min proc to work, but not in Shadow nor Rogue (I didn't test others).
 
This can be tested with a Blank character so I am not adding a char file.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Gnomish Lightning Generator missing its DPS ability

Comments.Message: I'll try to work this in when I do hand mounted pyros.
TY. also as a note: it can crit and seems that Spell power effects its damage.
I have found no information that this enchant scales with Spell Power, but it will scale with Crit and other damage increasing debuffs. Will be in for next release.
